query:
SELECT
                tool_name,
                COUNT(*) as "execution_count!",
                COALESCE(
                    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'success')::float / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0),
                    0.0
                ) as "success_rate!",
                COALESCE(AVG(execution_time_ms), 0)::bigint as "avg_duration_ms!"
            FROM mcp_tool_executions
            GROUP BY tool_name
            ORDER BY "execution_count!" DESC
            LIMIT $1
